page.title: 14"Stafford Rangers" F.C.
page.content:
Stafford Rangers was founded in 1879 and their ground is at Marston Road, Stafford.
All the present players are on free transfer, but their most expensive player was Trevor Dance who cost the club #10,000. There are only sixteen players and no junior team.
They train on Tuesday and Thursday evenings. The team plays an annual friendly match against Liverpool. They have played abroad in Italy.
The police are brought in in case of crowd trouble and the stand is made of concrete and steel with plastic seats so that there is little danger of fire.
